attributes.action: House of Commons to discuss a motion of no confidence in Speaker Bercow.
attributes.additional_details: For example deciding that he didn't want the democratically elected leader of the largest country in the world not to attend. This was outside his terms of reference and he continually makes judgements that are politically biased.
attributes.background: This Speaker continues to bring the House, Westminster and the mother of all Parliaments into disrepute and shame.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for a vote of no confidence.
